document_title: Curved penis: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis, prevention
subsection_content:
In addition to adjusting the position and angle of penetration during sex, men should also monitor the condition of their penis and see a doctor early when: (3)
Penile curvature has only recently appeared.; The angle of curvature of the penis is too large.; Penile curvature gradually increases.; Pain during erection, especially during sex; Indentations appear on the penis; The appearance of nodules in the tissue of the penis
The above symptoms may be a warning sign of injury or Peyronie's disease, not of a congenitally curved penis. Patients should see a doctor early to get advice on some remedies such as using medicine, surgery or changing lifestyle.
subsection_title: duong vat cong.json. When to see a doctor?
